Class TwoWireWrapper¶

  • Defined in File TwoWireWrapper.hpp

Class Documentation¶

class TwoWireWrapper¶

The class TwoWireWrapper is used to make the generic TwoWire available for Arduino.

Public Types

using BusType = TwoWire¶

Public Functions

inline explicit TwoWireWrapper()¶

Constructor of the TwoWireWrapper class with no function parameters. Sets the attribute icc to null-pointer.

inline explicit TwoWireWrapper(TwoWire &bus)¶

Constructor of the TwoWireWrapper class with a TwoWire function parameter. The passed TwoWire object is set to the icc attribute.

Parameters

bus – [in] Pointer to a TwoWire object which is set to icc class attribute.

inline ~TwoWireWrapper()¶

Destructor of the TwoWireWrapper class.

inline void init()¶

The function init initializes the icc-object of the class.

inline void deinit()¶

The function deinit de-initializes the icc-object of the class.

inline bool transfer(uint8_t iicAddress, uint8_t *txBuffer, uint8_t txLen, uint8_t *rxBuffer, uint8_t rxLen)¶

The function transfer is used to transfer the data through the I2C interface of the sensor.

Parameters

  • iicAddress – [in] I2C address of the sensor with which the communication should be established.

  • txBuffer – [in] Transmit buffer for the data that should be sent via I2C.

  • txLen – [in] Length of the data that should be sent.

  • rxBuffer – [in] Receive buffer for the data that is received during the I2C communication.

  • rxLen – [in] Length of the data that should be received.

Return values

  • 0 – Error.

  • 1 – Success.

Returns

The functions returns a boolean to indicate if the the transfer was successful.

inline TwoWire &getBus()¶

The function getBus returns the iic-bus object.

Returns

Returns the iic-bus object of the class.

inline void setBus(BusType &iicObj)¶

The function setBus sets the iic attribute of the class to an predefined object.

Parameters

iicObj – [in] Pre-defined iic-object which is passed to the object of the class.
